subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Hewitt, 34, looked as if he was going to close his career at the Open with a quick loss, but he fought back against Bernard Tomic, 22, and grinded to the end.
snippet: Hewitt, 34, looked as if he was going to close his career at the Open with a quick loss, but he fought back against Bernard Tomic, 22, and grinded to the end.
